unnormalised: **EdTech Boost: Scholarship Portals Making Education Accessible for All!**
normalised: **EdTech Boost: Scholarship Portals Making Education Accessible for All!**

unnormalised: Hey folks! Remember the days of scouring newspapers for scholarship announcements? Well, those days are kinda over thanks to booming scholarship portals! These EdTech platforms are connecting students like Rohan from IIT-Delhi and Priya from a village in Kerala with funding opportunities they might have otherwise missed.
normalised: Hey folks! Remember the days of scouring newspapers for scholarship announcements? Well, those days are kind of over thanks to booming scholarship portals! These E D Tech platforms are connecting students like Rohan from I I T-Delhi and Priya from a village in Kerala with funding opportunities they might have otherwise missed.

unnormalised: Think of it like a matchmaking service, but for your education dreams! Many portals even offer personalized recommendations based on your academic profile and interests, removing the guesswork and hassle.
normalised: Think of it like a matchmaking service, but for your education dreams! Many portals even offer personalized recommendations based on your academic profile and interests, removing the guesswork and hassle.

unnormalised: With Onam just around the corner, it's the perfect time to explore these portals and give your future a delicious leg-up, better than a plate of hot biryani, even!
normalised: With Onam just around the corner, it's the perfect time to explore these portals and give your future a delicious leg-up, better than a plate of hot biryani, even!

unnormalised: These portals list scholarships for everything from engineering degrees to pursuing music at the KM College of Music and Technology in Chennai. So, whether you're looking for Rs. 50,000 or Rs. 5,00,000, there's a scholarship out there waiting for you!
normalised: These portals list scholarships for everything from engineering degrees to pursuing music at the K M College of Music and Technology in Chennai. So, whether you're looking for rupee fifty thousand or rupee five lakh, there's a scholarship out there waiting for you!

unnormalised: Plus, some portals even offer mentorship and guidance to help you ace those application essays! Get searching!
normalised: Plus, some portals even offer mentorship and guidance to help you ace those application essays! Get searching!
